attributes.action: Perhaps moral and non-corrupt government by strong dictation rather than Western style democracy by consensus is needed for a culture
attributes.additional_details: The best way to deal with any perceived dangerous extreme views and ideologies is to win the argument with logic, as well as the hearts and minds of the people with such views. In some countries, perhaps moral and non-corrupt government by strong dictation rather than Western style democracy by consensus is needed for a culture in the circumstances.
